params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.schedule_time
params.description: A timestamp indicates when the next run will be scheduled. The value is refreshed by the server after each run. If unspecified, it will default to current server time, which means the scan will be scheduled to start immediately.

params.name: data.interval_duration_days
params.description: Required. The duration of time between executions in days.
